eligibility.additionalInfo: You must be 18 years of age or older to apply
Earn a minimum of $15,000 per annum

eligibility.additionalValue: Be an Australian citizen, permanent resident or have a valid visa

data.description: Whether you're looking to buy a new car, take a holiday, renovate your home or you want to consolidate debt, we could help you with an ANZ Variable Rate Personal Loan

lendingRates.additionalInfo: This comparison rate is based on a $30,000 Personal Loan for a five year term. This rate is applicable for unsecured loans only.

features.additionalInfo: Unlimited ANZ transactions available using ANZ Internet Banking, ANZ Phone Banking, ANZ ATMs, ANZ Business Visa Debit and EFTPOS. Also includes any deposit, withdrawal or transfer at ANZ branches, cheques drawn by you and any cheque or manual merchant slip deposited to your account.
Access using ANZ Internet Banking or ANZ App
If you have an ANZ Variable Rate Personal Loan, our redraw feature allows you to access the extra money you've repaid. You could take out money you've paid above your minimum monthly repayments.

Customer must apply by the 28th Feb, be approved and draw down a total loan size of $10,000 or more.   Cashback offer available to customers who apply for a new ANZ Personal Loan of $10,000 or more by 28 February 2022. This offer may be withdrawn or changed at any time without notice. The loan must be approved, and the funds drawn down within 90 days of approval to be eligible for the cashback offer. A limit of one $500 cashback offer per eligible customer within a 12-month period. The cashback payment will be paid within 120 days of drawdown into the transaction account which the loan funds are disbursed into, the transaction account must be in the same name as the loan account. For joint applications, only one cashback payment will be paid to the first listed applicant and the account for funds disbursements must include the name of the first listed applicant. Applications for a joint ANZ Personal Loan may only be made in branch. If a customer closes their ANZ Personal Loan account or transaction account before the cashback payment is paid, they may become ineligible for this offer. If you have any questions about the tax treatment of the cashback offer, please discuss with a tax agent or the Australian Tax Office.
features.additionalValue: Offer: $500 cashback on a new ANZ Personal of $10,000 or more.

fees.name: Loan Administration Charge
fees.additionalInfo: $10 per month, charged at the end of each quarter

fees.name: Late Payment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For ANZ Variable and Fixed Rate Personal Loans: this fee is charged for every month when all or part of the loan repayment hasn't been paid for five days or more. It's also charged every subsequent 30 days that repayments are overdue.

data.name: ANZ Variable Rate Personal Loan
